c74object.name: mira.channel
c74object.digest: Send and receive arbitrary data between Max and a browser.
c74object.description:
mira.channel allows for arbitrary data to be sent to and from Max and a web page. This data can be numbers, strings, lists, and objects (such as dictionaries). This object requires the the Miraweb Package, found in the Max Package Manager. Miraweb utilizes the
xebra.js
library, an open-source project on GitHub.

objarg.name: name
objarg.digest: Set the channel to send and receive.
objarg.description: Sets the name of the channel where messages are sent and received.

method.name: bang
method.description: Bangs are received by xebraState as Strings.

method.name: list
method.description: Lists are received by xebraState as Arrays.

method.name: anything
method.description: Anything is received by xebraState as Strings.

method.name: dictionary
method.description: Dictionaries are received by xebraState as Objects.
